sentences.en: Because of the spring rains, the farmers had a bounteous crop.
sentences.cn: 因为下了春雨, 农夫获得了丰收.

sentences.en: Her grace, quickness, her social felicities - seemed the overflow of a bounteous nature.
sentences.cn: 她端庄的仪态, 敏捷的反应, 伶俐的口才都似乎是多余的了.

sentences.en: If your charge is bounteous, can employ the creation ace on website of a few video.
sentences.cn: 如果你的费用宽裕, 可以雇用一些视频网站上的创作高手.

sentences.en: Let us give bounteous love to all mankind.
sentences.cn: 让我们献给人类无限的情怀.

sentences.en: My wee assistance in your bounteous hand, and the odor of tobacco.
sentences.cn: 我的小手在你的大手里, 还有烟草的味道.

sentences.en: Our dinner is very abundant ( bounteous ).
Sharpay Evans : Hey, Ilium whens the bounteous game?
sentences.cn: 莎佩: 嗨, 特洛伊,你的比赛是什么时候啊?

sentences.en: The second most common crop, soybeans, yields a lower return but crop rotation is necessary to keep the soil in shape for bounteous corn yields.
sentences.cn: 其次最常见的农作物，大豆，回报低，但轮作是必要的用以保证土壤能够拥有宽裕的玉米产量。

sentences.en: We are grateful to you for your bounteous gifts.
sentences.cn: 对您给予的丰厚礼物,我们不胜感激.

words.tran_cn: 发给…奖金等；为…而发给赏金

trans.tran_cn: <书>大方的，慷慨的，<诗>丰富的，充足的
